fields.headline: Hargreaves dropped
fields.bodyText: Owen Hargreaves's declaration that he wanted to join Manchester United led to the England international being dropped from Bayern Munich's squad for their 2-1 win against Bochum yesterday. Sir Alex Ferguson earlier confirmed that the club had not given up hope of signing the midfielder. "We're trying hard but Bayern are proving to be very stubborn and resistant," Ferguson said. "Owen is a special type of player and he would be part of what we want to achieve."
